original_text: You yourselves are also like stones that are alive. God is using you, like stones, to build a house where his Spirit lives. You will serve him like his special priests who offer sacrifices to him. God will be happy with the spiritual offerings that you give to him, because you belong to Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 너희도 산 돌 같이 신령한 집으로 세워지고 예수 그리스도로 말미암아 하나님이 기쁘게 받으실 신령한 제사를 드릴 거룩한 제사장이 될지니라

sentences.original_text: You yourselves are also like stones that are alive.
God is using you, like stones, to build a house
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 집을 짓기 위해 너희를 돌처럼 사용하고 계십니다.

sentences.original_text: You will serve him like his special priests
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그의 특별한 제사장들처럼 그를 섬길 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: God will be happy with the spiritual offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 영적인 제물들에 대해 기뻐하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: because you belong to Jesus Christ.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 너희는 예수 그리스도에게 속하기 때문입니다.
